trans-unit.source: Represents the style of a node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer stilen på en node i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the TreeNodeStyle class to represent the style of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk klassen TreeNodeStyle til å representere stilen på en node i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control allows you to specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for each of the different node types.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll lar deg angi ulike stilen (for eksempel skriftstørrelse og farge) for hver annen node-typen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the node styles that are supported by the TreeNodeStyle class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser node-stiler som støttes av TreeNodeStyle-klassen.

trans-unit.source: |Node style property|Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for the leaf nodes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>|The default style settings for a node.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for the parent nodes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for the root node.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for a selected node.| When you set the node style properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, they are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: | Node-stilegenskap | Beskrivelse | |-------------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for en node når musepekeren er plassert over det. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for blad-nodene. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>| Stilen standardinnstillingene for en node. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for de overordnede nodene. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for rotnode. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for en valgt node. | Når du angir noden stilegenskaper av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll, blir tatt i bruk i følgende rekkefølge: 1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, avhengig av nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeStyle class inherits most of its members from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeStyle klassen arver de fleste av medlemmene fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: It extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class by providing properties that control the amount of space around the text in a node, as well as the space between adjacent nodes.
trans-unit.target: Det går det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>klassen ved å angi egenskaper som styrer hvor mye diskplass rundt tekst i en node, i tillegg til avstanden mellom tilstøtende noder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.HorizontalPadding%2A> property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the text in a node.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.HorizontalPadding%2A>til å kontrollere hvor området til venstre og høyre for teksten i en node.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.HorizontalPadding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.VerticalPadding%2A> property controls the amount of space above and below the text in a node.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.VerticalPadding%2A>egenskapen kontrollerer mengden avstand over og under tekst i en node.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.VerticalPadding%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can control the amount of spacing between the node that the TreeNodeStyle is applied to and its adjacent nodes by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.NodeSpacing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere avstanden mellom noden som er brukt i TreeNodeStyle og de tilstøtende nodene ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.NodeSpacing%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.NodeSpacing%2A>

trans-unit.source: To control the amount of spacing between a parent node and a child node, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.ChildNodesPadding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere avstanden mellom en overordnet node og en underordnet node i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.ChildNodesPadding%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.ChildNodesPadding%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the inherited style settings, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om arvede stilinnstillingene, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object information.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objekt informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Use the TreeNodeStyle constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> class by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> object that is specified by the `bag` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Bruk TreeNodeStyle-konstruktør til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>klassen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>objektet som er angitt av den `bag` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> that stores the style information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> som lagrer stilinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between a parent node and a child node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> class is applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom en overordnet node og en underordnet node som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> klassen brukes.

trans-unit.source: Use the ChildNodesPadding property to control the amount of space above and below the child nodes section of the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> class is applied.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ChildNodesPadding-egenskapen for å kontrollere hvor avstand over og under delen underordnede noder av noden som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>klassen brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: This spacing is inserted between the parent node and its first child node, as well as between its last child node and the next node.
trans-unit.target: Denne avstanden er satt inn mellom overordnet node og første underordnede noden, i tillegg til mellom siste underordnede noden og den neste noden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The space after the last child node is not rendered if there are no additional nodes following the last child node, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Mellomrom etter den siste underordnede noden ikke gjengis Hvis det finnes ingen flere noder etter den siste underordnede noden fordi dette gir en unødvendige avstanden nederst i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To control the amount of space between child nodes, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.NodeSpacing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere avstanden mellom underordnede noder av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.NodeSpacing%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.NodeSpacing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, that is above and below the child nodes section of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden i piksler, som er over og under delen underordnede noder av en overordnet node.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 piksler.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref> or is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er av typen <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"> </xref> eller er mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the style properties of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object into the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører stilegenskaper for det angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objektet i gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyFrom method to duplicate the style properties of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object that calls this method.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden CopyFrom duplisere stilegenskaper for det angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet som kaller opp denne metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All properties in the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object are replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alle egenskapene i gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet er erstattet med de tilsvarende egenskapene i den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: To copy style properties without replacing any values that have already been set, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.MergeWith%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil kopiere stilegenskaper uten å erstatte alle verdier som allerede er angitt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.MergeWith%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.MergeWith%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> to copy.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the text in the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor området til venstre og høyre for teksten i noden.

trans-unit.source: Use the HorizontalPadding property to control the amount of horizontal space around the text of the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> is applied.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HorizontalPadding-egenskapen for å kontrollere vannrette avstanden rundt teksten av noden som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: This space is inserted between the left edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the right edge of the text and the border for the text.
trans-unit.target: Dette området er satt inn mellom venstre kant av teksten og kantlinjen for området for, i tillegg til mellom høyre kant av teksten og kantlinjen for teksten.

trans-unit.source: To control the vertical spacing, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.VerticalPadding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere loddrett avstand i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.VerticalPadding%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.VerticalPadding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, that is to the left and right of the node's text.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden i piksler, som er til venstre og høyre for teksten for noden.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 piksler.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref> or is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er av typen <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"> </xref> eller er mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som vises ved siden av noden.

trans-unit.source: Use the ImageUrl property to specify a custom image for style.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen ImageUrl til å angi en egendefinert bildet for stil.

trans-unit.source: This image is displayed next to the node, and it can be in any image-file format (such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet vises ved siden av noden, og den kan være en bildefil format (for eksempel JPG, GIF, BMP og så videre), så lenge klientleseren støtter dette formatet.

trans-unit.source: If both the ImageUrl and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> properties are set, the image that is displayed is the one that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge ImageUrl og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>egenskapene er angitt, som vises, er det som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image that is displayed next to the node.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et egendefinert bilde som vises ved siden av noden.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the ImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at egenskapen ImageUrl ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Combines the style properties of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object with the style properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Kombinerer stilegenskaper for det angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objekt med stilegenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the MergeWith method to combine the style properties of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object with the style properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden MergeWith for å kombinere stilegenskaper for det angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objekt med stilegenskaper av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet som denne metoden kalles fra.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The MergeWith method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object with its corresponding value in the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For MergeWith metoden slår sammen stilegenskaper ved å angi hver egenskap som ikke er angitt i gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objekt med den tilsvarende verdien i den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: Only properties that have not been set are updated.
trans-unit.target: Bare egenskaper som ikke er angitt, er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: If a property in the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object is not set, the corresponding property in the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object does not change.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap i den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objektet ikke er angitt, den tilsvarende egenskapen i gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet blir ikke endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that will merge with the current node's settings.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som vil slå sammen med innstillingene for den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object is applied and its adjacent nodes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir loddrett avstanden mellom noden som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> objektet brukes og de tilstøtende nodene.

trans-unit.source: Use the NodeSpacing property to control the amount of vertical spacing between a node that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> is applied to and its adjacent nodes at the same level.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NodeSpacing-egenskapen for å kontrollere loddrette avstanden mellom en node som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>gjelder og de tilstøtende nodene på samme nivå.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: This space is inserted between the upper edge of the current node and the lower edge of the previous node, as well as between the lower edge of the current node and upper edge of the next node.
trans-unit.target: Dette området er satt inn mellom øvre kant av den gjeldende noden og nedre kant av noden tidligere, i tillegg til mellom nedre kant av den gjeldende noden og øvre kant av den neste noden.

trans-unit.source: The upper space is not rendered for the first node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the top of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den øvre plassen gjengis ikke for den første noden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollere, fordi dette gir en unødvendige avstanden øverst i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The NodeSpacing and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.ChildNodesPadding%2A> properties are applied independently.
trans-unit.target: NodeSpacing og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.ChildNodesPadding%2A>Egenskaper brukes uavhengig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.ChildNodesPadding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whether or not the node is expanded does not affect the node spacing.
trans-unit.target: Om noden vises, påvirker ikke avstanden noden.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The amount of vertical space, in pixels, between the node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> is applied and its adjacent nodes at the same level.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett diskplass, i piksler mellom noden som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> brukes og de tilstøtende nodene på samme nivå.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 piksler.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref> or is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er av typen <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"> </xref> eller er mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object to its original state.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> objektet til sin opprinnelige tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Use the Reset method to remove any previously defined style elements and reset the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object to its original (that is, default) state.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden tilbakestilling til å fjerne eventuelle tidligere definert stilelementer og tilbakestille den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet til tilstanden opprinnelig (som er standard).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below the text for a node.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden over og under teksten for en node.

trans-unit.source: Use the VerticalPadding property to control the amount of vertical space around the text of the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> class is applied.
trans-unit.target: Bruk VerticalPadding-egenskapen for å kontrollere loddrette avstanden rundt teksten av noden som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>klassen brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: This space is inserted between the upper edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the lower edge of the text and the border for the text.
trans-unit.target: Dette området er satt inn mellom øvre kant av teksten og kantlinjen på området for, i tillegg til mellom nedre kant av teksten og kantlinjen for teksten.

trans-unit.source: To control the horizontal spacing, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.HorizontalPadding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere vannrett avstand i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.HorizontalPadding%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.HorizontalPadding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, above and below a node's text.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye diskplass, i piksler, over og under en node tekst.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 piksler.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref> or is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er av typen <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"> </xref> eller er mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>.
